    • Uses of Player in chess.domain

      Methods in chess.domain that return Player 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Player GameSituation.whoseTurn()
      Returns player whose turn is now.
      Methods in chess.domain with parameters of type Player 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void GameSituation.makePawnsUnEnPassantable(Player player)
      Changes the field movedTwoSquaresLastTurn to false for every pawn player owns thus making them no longer possible to be captured en passant.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean CheckingLogic.checkIfChecked(Player player)
